long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FxPro provides the best and most popular forex trading tools directly from your browser!

(Trade Responsibly: CFDs are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. 75.56% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with this provider. You should consider whether you understand how CFDs work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.)
Featuring

Economic Calendar - Provides real-time results of Economic data releases and upcoming events.

Market Quotes  - Latest prices including daily highs/lows for a range of assets.

Trader’s Dashboard - Gives valuable insights into currency movers, where traders are currently positioned and volatility. 

Forex Calculator - With the all-in-one calculator, perform all needed trade calculations with ease! Includes required margin, pip value, swaps & cTrader commission. 

The extension is also connected to several FxPro products and pages, allowing for 1-click access to the information you need. If you have any questions or feedback, you can directly chat with our 5* customer service team via the extension, 24/5. 

Install tools for trader’s browser extension – and start trading like a Pro!
